snippet: A 16-year-old boy who was teased by his California high school classmates will be charged as an adult for allegedly wounding a classmate with a shotgun and trying to target another.
abstract: Bryan Oliver, 16-year-old-boy who was teased by his California high school classmates, is to be charged as an adult for allegedly wounding a classmate with a shotgun and trying to target another at Taft Union High School in Kern County.
lead_paragraph: A 16-year-old boy who was teased by his California high school classmates will be charged as an adult for allegedly wounding a classmate with a shotgun and trying to target another.

headline.main: California: Adult Charges For Boy In School Shooting
headline.print_headline: California: Adult Charges For Boy In School Shooting
